issue.title: [C++] Add ValidateAscii function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8633](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8633). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In some cases, we want to be able to check whether it's safe to use functions that assume ASCII (like `std::tolower`, or {{std::string::substr). This was implemented in a PR for ARROW-6131 that was not merged
